alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 25 at 9:05AM AKST until January 27 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory on the Bering Strait Coast, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch for St Lawrence Island, blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch for blizzard conditions means there is a potential for falling and/or blowing snow with strong winds and extremely poor visibilities. This can lead to whiteout conditions and make travel very difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
